name: frazzled
content:
frazzled adjective
(TIRED)
Add to word list
Add to word list
informal extremely tired in a nervous or slightly worried way after a lot of mental or physical effort: It was a stressful day at work and by 5.00 I was completely frazzled.

frazzled adjective
(BURNED)
UK informal burned or dried out after being in the sun or cooking for too long: I'd only been in the sun a couple of hours and my back was frazzled. By the time I remembered about the meat it was frazzled.
